sentences.english: In my opinion, China must depend on intensive cultivation to feed itself.
sentences.chinese: 我看中国就是靠精耕细作吃饭。

sentences.english: The vegetables are growing well through deep plowing and careful cultivation.
sentences.chinese: 经过深耕细作，蔬菜长势良好。

sentences.english: We can certainly increase the productivity of land through deep ploughing and careful management.
sentences.chinese: 通过深耕细作，我们一定可以提高土地产量。

sentences.english: We saw new factories and well-cultivated fields all along the line.
sentences.chinese: 铁路沿线到处可见新建的工厂和精耕细作的田地。

sentences.english: Gold and we trust his report will Song Yingchang message tell the precious people.
sentences.chinese: 金公谅的细作将宋应昌的消息告知金贵人。

sentences.english: Chaoshan farmers to intensive famous, such as embroidery farming to speak of.
sentences.chinese: 潮汕农民以精耕细作闻名，有种田如绣花之说。

sentences.english: To make up for the lack of land, he proposed intensive cultivation of the fields.
sentences.chinese: 为了弥补土地不足，他建议精耕细作。
